test.control_if_3: test{if 1 == 1} water{if 2 == 2} grain{if 1 == 1} test{if 5==5}ok{else}not ok{/if}{/if} butter{else} atre{/if} end{else} dus {$test.variable}{/if}
test.control_if_2: test{if 1 == 1} water{if 2 == 2} grain{if 1 == 1} test{/if} butter{else} atre{/if} end{else} dus {$test.variable}{/if}

output.control_if_2: test water grain test butter end
output.control_if_3: test water grain testok butter end
